title: No sound from my Pixel Buds. Other functions work, control the volume, pause/play and on/off.
content:
My Pixel Buds no longer play audio.
They pair fine to all devices, Pixel 3a, LG G6, iPhone 6 and Surface Pro 3 laptop. 
I can still turn them on/off, volume up/down and play/pause using gestures, just no audio. 
I don't even get the standard sound that they've turned on/off. 

I've reset them numerous times (hold 40 Seconds). Re-paired them to the phones again and again. 

This started a few days ago (I've only had them for a week), where the sound cut out. But after placing the headphones back into the charging case for a few minutes they seemed to work again. 

Any ideas on how to fix his? .
